---

<h3 id="change-your-ipv6-by-using-bridge-adapter">change your ipv6 by using bridge adapter</h3>
<p><img src="https://www.linuxbabe.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/openSUSE-Settings_693.png" alt=""></p>
<pre><code>ifconfig
</code></pre>
<p>to find you ipv6 look like this</p>
<blockquote>
<p>fe80::a06e:2750:4dc:4f41</p>
</blockquote>
<pre><code>ping -6 fe80::a06e:2750:4dc:4f41
</code></pre>
<p>to make sure its working</p>
<p>then you can connect to your browser using</p>
<p>http://[fe80::a06e:2750:4dc:4f41]</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Written with <a href="https://stackedit.io/">StackEdit</a>.</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="dynv6">dynv6</h3>
<p><a href="https://dynv6.com/">https://dynv6.com/</a><br>
create an account then use your ip address, then paste your domain in your browser</p>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="enter image description here"></p>
